name: ShopPlus
desc: Full-stack e-commerce platform with React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Features include JWT authentication, product management, cart/wishlist, admin dashboard, and order tracking. Deployed on Vercel and Railway.

name: ResumeAI
desc: AI-powered resume builder and analyzer developed with React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Integrated OpenAI API to generate professional resumes from user prompts with dynamic templates, PDF export, and sharing features. Designed for scalability, responsive UI, and seamless frontendâ€“backend integration. Deployed on Vercel and Render.

name: MINTRA CLONE
desc: Frontend e-commerce clone of Myntra built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented dynamic product layouts, responsive design, and interactive UI components to replicate core shopping experience.

name: CALCULATOR
desc: Developed a fully functional calculator using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Supports real-time operations with clean UI, responsive layout, and basic arithmetic functionalities.

name: TODO APP
desc: Simple task management app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Allows users to add, mark, and delete tasks with interactive front-end functionality.

name: Small Crick
desc: Interactive cricket mini-game built with JavaScript. Provides a fun, browser-based experience with dynamic score updates and responsive gameplay.
